snippet: EISENBERG--Ada. Born April 20, 1917. Died peacefully April 17, 2016. Devoted wife of Samuel Eisenberg. Loving mother of Joan, Daniel and Richard. Loving grandmother of Rachel, Stephanie, Lauren and Caroline; great-grandmother of Sylvie, Elan and Sydney. Proud Hebrew school and college graduate (BBA from NYU and MS from Columbia). Independent and tenacious; bird enthusiast; advocate of smart money management, equal rights and continuous learning. She will be missed by us all. 1/3
lead_paragraph: EISENBERG--Ada. Born April 20, 1917. Died peacefully April 17, 2016. Devoted wife of Samuel Eisenberg. Loving mother of Joan, Daniel and Richard. Loving grandmother of Rachel, Stephanie, Lauren and Caroline; great-grandmother of Sylvie, Elan and Sydney. Proud Hebrew school and college graduate (BBA from NYU and MS from Columbia). Independent and tenacious; bird enthusiast; advocate of smart money management, equal rights and continuous learning. She will be missed by us all. 1/3
